rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: I love this guy!  His class was probably the first chem that I wasn't incredibly tempted to fall asleep!  His lectures are very clear, much better than reading the book.  His exams are straight-forward, very similar to the practice exams.  I definitely recommend this professor!  He is a cute old man too :)
I love this guy. He's really funny, dedicated to the success of his students and clearly loves what he does. Plus for an old guy, he's really easy on the eyes. Just sayin'.
Awesome professor--funny, fair, clear and generally interesting.
Competent lecturer.  Test grading was fair.  Dedicated students in this class will learn and succeed.  The material is tough, so be prepared to study.
Excellent chemistry instructor, somewhat difficult, but more than fair.
